text: So pleased you are well in yourself. I logged on today to check you was ok as I too did not get a notification that you had replied! It must of been a stressful time to support your colleagues with everything going on.

England are on 'stay at home' until further notice, was meant to be reviewed mon 13/4 but they have now said it won't be. I have been studying from home. Its my easter school holiday and I have completed all my home work so trying to find things to do. Its nice that I can still talk to my mates by facetime. My dad and brother are working from home but my mum is a key worker so she is going to work each day. We have all been well and don't know anyone that has been ill, which is a good thing.

Karen has replied to me which is so kind of her to do. I understand with the current situation that it maybe quite some time before they could possibly let me job shadow. I need to compose a reply to her.
We are meant to be going on holiday to New York and Toronto in July, but as the days pass its looking more unlikely. Have you had to rearrange plans or holidays?
